```{r, eval = F, echo = F}
# Create bib file for R packages

tidylist <- c('dplyr', 'forcats', 'lubridate', 'tibble')

here::here("inst/tutorials/discovr_03/packages.bib") |>
  knitr::write_bib(c(easylist, tidylist, otherlist), file = _)
```

In this tutorial all packages are pre-loaded. If working outside of the tutorial, load the [tidyverse]{.pkg} package at the beginning of your `r quarto()` document:

```{r eval = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

This tutorial uses the following packages from [tidyverse]{.pkg}
 
- [dplyr]{.pkg}: [@R-dplyr]
- [forcats]{.pkg} [@R-forcats]
- [tibble]{.pkg} [@R-tibble]
